name: IDPay For MyCred
author: IDPay

sections.description:
After installing and enabling this plugin, your customers can pay through IDPay gateway.
For doing a transaction through IDPay gateway, you must have an API Key. You can obtain the API Key by going to your dashboard in your IDPay account.

1.2.2, Nov 13, 2022

  • Tested Up With WordPress 6.1 And MyCred Plugin 2.4.4.4

1.2.1, June 18, 2022

  • First Official Release
  • Tested Up With WordPress 6.0 And MyCred Plugin 2.4.4.4
  • Check Double Spending Correct
  • Check Does Not Xss Attack Correct
  • Fix SandBox Mode For Payment In Fake State
  • Important : Fix Save Transaction Status In Wrong Location

  • check GET parameters if POST was empty in relation with IDPay webservices new update.

  • Correct recipient’s display name.
  • Fix bugs.

  • Try to connect to the gateway multiple times.
  • Fix bugs.

1.0, May 14, 2019

  • Develope Release.
sections.installation:
1. After creating a Web Service on https://idpay.ir and getting an API Key, follow this instruction:
  2. Activate plugin IDPay for myCRED.
  3. Go to Settings .
  4. In the Payment Gateway section, choose IDPay.
  5. Enter the API Key.
  • If you need to use this plugin in Test mode, Select the “Sandbox” checkbox.
